Question
========

Which assumption of a repeated measures ANOVA is tested by Mauchly's test?

  
Answerlist
----------
* Equal variance of differences between measurements.
* Equal variance between subjects.
* Normal distribution of differences between measurements.
* Normal distribution of repeated observations.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
